# invalidate()

**Instance Method**

Prevents the background activity from being scheduled again.

## Declaration

```swift
func invalidate()
```

## Discussion

When `invalidate` is used to stop an activity that is currently executing, the activity will still finish executing.

See [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSBackgroundActivityScheduler#Stop-Activity].
title: invalidate()
